channel.title: [PI] curiousity... [PI]
channel.description: is there any way to code a command which makes you 100% invisible including your minimap dot... i mean im just speculating here but... you know those old deception sources... like. the originally released deception... well yeah it would be cool.

item.title: [PI] curiousity... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:7, topic:426265”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=528958.msg3858744#msg3858744 date=1324527209]

Yes, this can be done 100% Client-Sided.

not 100%

youd need some server sided making the command in commands.java to initiate it

Lol, commands can be made Client-Sided as well. Clients aren’t even my area of expertise and I know that.
[/quote]

you Don’t have to act smart, im an idiot when it comes to java and you come off stupid to me so back the fuck up.[/quote]

I can see why you’re being watched. I wasn’t “acting smart”, I am smart. You don’t have to tell me you’re an idiot when it comes to Java, you were asking which Class to find a Packet in earlier.

EDIT: I was even helping you with it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] curiousity... [PI]

[/quote]

you Don’t have to act smart, im an idiot when it comes to java and you come off stupid to me so back the fuck up.[/quote]
team_rocket wasn’t being rude. he even said he was is unfamiliar with rsps clients. you on the other handed, corrected him, acting as if you knew for sure, when you know you have no idea?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] curiousity... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

The command packet is sent from Client -> server, so there is no server side editing required.

Just handle the command via the client.

Read full topic
